author: ET CONTRIBUTORS
title: Planning to reduce your SIP investment? Try pruning discretionary expenses
description: Post-Covid19 life would be very different. Be it your social, economic, political… nothing is going to remain the same. Government policies would change, policies of companies would change, and even household rules would see a lot of changes.
content: By Ashish ModaniPost-Covid19 life would be very different. Be it your social, economic, political… nothing is going to remain the same. Government policies would change, policies of companies would change, and even household rules would see a lot of changes. … [+1882 chars]
